div.h3: Trash collection update due to Covid-19 situation.

img.alt: image of East Greenwich Town Hall Sign

strong.span: DUE TO THE ONGOING COVID-19 CRISIS
EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY AND UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE:

ul.li: CURBSIDE COLLECTION OF BULKY ITEMS INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO APPLIANCES AND MATTRESSES IS SUSPENDED.
CURBSIDE COLLECTION OF YARD WASTE IS SUSPENDED.
The Transfer Station will remain open on Saturdays from 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM for residents dropping off trash and recycling materials ONLY (NO Yard Waste).
Residents may take yard waste to the Highway Garage located at 3 Bear Swamp Road on Tuesday through Saturday from 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

div.p: TRASH & RECYCLE COLLECTION WILL REMAIN ON A REGULAR SCHEDULE.
